channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WV
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WV

item.title: Report X-2023100841
item.description:
Report X-2023100841

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-16T18:13:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-04
  • City: CHARLESTON
  • State: WV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: A package handler noticed the hazmat box was leaking and informed a manager. Jeremy Rust(QA) responded with goggles and gloves and secured the package inside a hazmat bag and hazmat tub DescribePack: The aluminum cans are bent possibly due to handling or transport. One can is bent enough to cause a break in the caps seal. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed inside a hazmat bag followed by a hazmat tub.
